SEARCH
Package com.ivatolm.app.database

Interface DataBase<T extends Serializable & DataBaseObject>

All Known Implementing Classes:
CSVDatabase
public interface DataBase<T extends Serializable & DataBaseObject>
Interface for interacting with a file (database). Note: Scalability of the interface is limited without generic T. While reading from the file its necessary to create new instances of T. Because of type erasure it's impossible to create instance of class T at runtime. Dummy object is a workaround for that.
Author:
ivatolm
